====Compounds====
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|桜チーズ|さくら チーズ}}: [[sakura]] [[cheese]]: see [[w:Sakura cheese|sakura cheese]]
* {{ja-r|桜木|さくらぎ}}: [[cherry tree]]
* {{ja-r|桜花|おうか}}, {{ja-r|桜花|さくらばな}}: [[cherry blossom]] ([[flower]])
* {{ja-r|桜桃|さくらんぼ}}, {{ja-r|桜桃|おうとう}}: [[cherry]] (lit. cherry & [[peach]])
* {{ja-r|桜ん坊|さくらんぼ}}: [[cherry]] ([[fruit]]) mostly used for Japanese cherries
* {{ja-r|桜色|さくらいろ}}: (''[[complexion]]''): [[pink]]; [[florid]]
* {{ja-r|桜海老|さくら えび}}: a kind of [[shrimp]] or [[prawn]]
* {{ja-r|桜貝|さくらがい}}: a kind of [[shellfish]]
* {{ja-r|桜草|さくらそう}}: [[primrose]]
* {{ja-r|桜肉|さくらにく}}: [[horsemeat]]
* {{ja-r|桜餅|さくらもち}}: [[w:Sakuramochi|sakuramochi]]
* {{ja-r|桜前線|さくら ぜんせん}}: the cherry-blossom [[front]]
* {{ja-r|桜湯|さくら ゆ}}: [[sakura tea]]
* {{ja-r|桜吹雪|さくら ゆき}}: a flurry of falling cherry blossoms

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|さくら|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さくら|サクラ|kyu=櫻}}

# a [[cherry]] tree, more specifically the Japanese cherry, {{taxlink|Prunus serrulata|species|noshow=1}}
# a [[cherry]] blossom
# cherry [[wood]]
# cherry [[bark]]
# short for {{m|ja|桜色|tr=sakura iro||a pink color, the color of cherry blossoms}}
# short for {{l|ja|桜重}}, {{m|ja|桜襲|tr=sakuragasane||a layered style of wearing [[kimono]] with one layer in the ''sakura iro'' color}}
# short for {{m|ja|桜肉|tr=sakura niku||[[horsemeat]]}}, from the color
# alternate term for {{m|ja|天保一分銀|tr=Tenpō ichibugin}}, a [[rectangular]] [[silver]] [[coin]] issued during the {{m|ja|天保|tr=Tenpō}} era (1830-1844), so called for its cherry blossom pattern; worth one-quarter of a {{m|ja|両|tr=ryō}}
# in the [[w:Kansai region|Kansai region]], a class of [[prostitute]] in the [[red-light district]]
# short for {{m|ja|桜湯|tr=sakura yu||sakura tea}}
# the [[suit]] of [[card]]s in a [[hanafuda]] deck that show the cherry blossom, representing the [[month]] of [[March]]
# the [[middle]] of the [[dorsal]] [[fin]] of a [[fish]]
# in [[theater]] during the [[w:Edo period|Edo Period]], a special [[box]] or [[balcony]] [[seat]] for a [[hired]] [[applauder]], someone requested to cheer on the [[performer]]s
# {{lb|ja|sort=さくら|slang}} a [[shill]], [[capper]], or [[come-on]] working for a [[store]], [[auction]], or even a [[swindle]], who is paid to [[attract]] [[customer]]s or [[mark]]s
# {{lb|ja|sort=さくら|slang}} a [[slang]] or [[jargon]] word for {{m|ja|耳|tr=mimi||ear}}
# short for {{m|ja|佐倉炭|tr=Sakura-zumi}}, a high-quality {{m|ja|炭|tr=sumi||charcoal}} made in {{m|ja|佐倉|tr=[[w:Sakura,_Chiba|Sakura]], [[w:Chiba Prefecture|Chiba Prefecture]]}}, using {{lang|ja|桜}} as [[ateji]] for {{l|ja|佐倉}}

* {{sense|sakura tea}} {{ja-r|桜湯|さくら ゆ}}
